name: Tea:Toon
description:
Tea:Toon is a cute AR experience that you can download to your own phone and enjoy while having a nice cup of tea. It comes with a set of teas, and each of them has a unique marker that will play a unique paper theater like animation for around 30 seconds. 

All of the cute animations  are related to the tea they belong to, and the tea bag wrapping comes with a little story that you can read to undesrtand the story of said tea better!

(I will upload the build for download, but without the markers the animations can't be played)

Team project
